body:
• Scalable
    • Adding and removing nodes is incredibly easy
  • "Operationally boring"
    • Depending on configuration/application requirements, a huge amount of nodes can die before Riak starts to show errors (just ask Julio Capote)
    • In essence, a perfect meta-storm of perfect storms is required to cause catastrophic failure
  • Hot-updates
    • Built with Erlang/OTP, supports updating the cluster without bringing it down first
    • Kresten Krab Thorup recently did this without problems
